Question.Subject: HOW DO I GET WIRELESS INTERNET SERVICE?
Question.Content: A friend sent me his old laptop, someone told me to buy an antenna that plugs into it? Help! I am a computer dummie!!!
Question.ChosenAnswer: If its an old laptop, you'll have to first verify whether the laptop has a wireless card inside. If not, you'd need a PCMCIA wireless card. After that you can get free wireless internet service by visiting various places that offer free wifi.

Answer.Content: If its an old laptop, you'll have to first verify whether the laptop has a wireless card inside. If not, you'd need a PCMCIA wireless card. After that you can get free wireless internet service by visiting various places that offer free wifi.
